title: Junior's Back, Sheryl Underwood, Baby Hair, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Junior's Back, Sheryl Underwood, Baby Hair, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's Friday Eve and the crew is talking to you like you are 7. Bitterman gets real with a woman who made a shocking discovery in Trampa. Rihanna officially hits rare air. The CEO of Team Tommy has questions just for black women about baby hair. Your favorite play cousin is back with Leave Simone Alone. Now that Junior is back, his ex (Sheryl Underwood) had something to say. Carla talks about the return of Real Husbands of Hollywood in Reality Update. The fellas let the ladies know the important things about having a man cave. Today the show wraps up with the fellas wondering how the H did T.I. get arrested in Amsterdam.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
